DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate long-term safety Ba253BINEB . Secondarily long-term efficacy Ba253BINEB also investigate .
DOC.brief_title: Ba253BINEB Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: The patient COPD ( chronic bronchitis , emphysema ) satisfy follow criterion 1 . Patients FEV1.0/FVC ( Forced vital capacity ) < = 70 % screen test whose symptom stable 2 . Patients age > = 40 year old 3 . Patients must able understand patient information form 1 . Patients complicate bronchial asthma , make assessment drug efficacy COPD difficult 2 . Patients take long acting corticosteroid ( i.m . ) within 1 month study 3 . Patients use oral corticosteroid medication dose excess equivalent 5 mg/day prednisolone 4 . Patients glaucoma 5 . Patients prostatic hypertrophy 6 . Patients hypersensitivity anticholinergic drug 7 . Patients serious hepatic disease , kidney disease heart disorder judge investigator inappropriate subject study 8 . Women pregnant may become pregnant , nursing woman 9 . Patients judge investigator inappropriate subject study
